description: Zhejiang Dahua Technology Co., Ltd. (Dahua Technology) is a world-leading* video-centric smart IoT solution and service provider. Dahua Technology has deployed its products, solutions, and services in 180 countries and regions, covering key industries including smart city, traffic, retail, banking & finance, energy, etc. Committed to technological innovation and investing approximately 10% of its annual sales revenue in R&D, Dahua Technology continues to explore emerging opportunities based on video IoT technologies and has already established businesses in machine vision, video conferencing systems, professional drones, smart fire safety, automobile technologies, smart storage, robotics, etc., enabling a safer society and smarter living.

update_data/4/content:
- Dahua SMB Solution -
The Dahua EAS Loss Prevention Solution 🛒 for stores and grocery shops provides reliable and accurate shoplifting detection and alerts, quick security guard responses, and seamlessly integration with AI video surveillance to enhances the efficiency of relevant video evidence retrieval, minimizing any losses. 

Click here to find more:https://lnkd.in/gYGW9898…more
update_data/5/content:
With#Dahua#XinghanVision Models, the IPC WizMind 5 Series delivers 🔭 50% longer detection (98% ✅ accuracy) with 🚫 92% fewer false alarms, 🐾 intelligently detects 10+ animal types (90% accuracy), and ✨ features AI auto-drawn rule lines—redefining smart security through precision and reliability. 

Looking forward to more informations? please check here:https://lnkd.in/gBd8XB_g

- Dahua SMB Solution - 
Dahua's Advertising Optimization Solution 🎯 provides a variety of content display options and flexible arrangements, greatly enhancing advertising management efficiency. By leveraging Dahua's AI Visitor Analytics, store owners can analyze customer data to assess ad performance using camera footage and make real-time content adjustments. 

Check here to find more about this#SMBsolution:https://bit.ly/4p2bQJ8#Dahua…more

update_data/9/content:
Powered by#Dahua#XinghanModels, the IPC-MFW5241T2-E3-ASE from the IPC-5 Series delivers advanced perimeter protection 🛡️ with an extended 140m detection range 🔍 and reduced false alarms ⚡, ensuring reliable security. 
Featuring 3×2MP resolution 📷, dual mic & speaker 🎙️, and micro PTZ for flexible monitoring 🔄, it supports independent and FlexStream encoding while offering easy installation 🛠️ for seamless deployment.
